name: MyCoffee
description:
Hello !

You are going to play MyCoffe (sorry for the lame name !)

You will have to serve coffee to the customers. Take care to do your job corretly, don't let the cup empty or let coffee flow everywhere !

How to play :

  • Press E : add coffee
  • Press R : add Milk

You will have to serve :

  • Expresso : 100% coffee
  • Cappuchino : 30% coffee 70% milk
  • Coffe to go : 70% coffee 30% milk
